an6.53:4.1: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha,
an6.53:4.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side,
an6.53:5.1: “Master Gotama, is there one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
an6.53:5.2: the present life and lives to come?”
an6.53:6.3: “Diligence, brahmin, is one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
an6.53:6.4: the present life and lives to come.
an6.53:7.1: The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint.
an6.53:7.2: So an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
an6.53:7.3: In the same way, diligence is one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
an6.53:7.4: the present life and lives to come.
an6.53:8.1: The rafters of a bungalow all lean to the peak, slope to the peak, and meet at the peak, so the peak is said to be the topmost of them all.
an6.53:8.2: In the same way, diligence is one thing …
an6.53:9.1: A reed-cutter, having cut the reeds, grabs them at the top and shakes them down, shakes them about, and shakes them off.
an6.53:9.2: In the same way, diligence is one thing …
an6.53:10.1: When the stalk of a bunch of mangoes is cut, all the mangoes attached to the stalk will follow along.
an6.53:10.2: In the same way, diligence is one thing …
an6.53:11.1: All lesser rulers are vassals of a wheel-turning monarch, so the wheel-turning monarch is said to be the foremost of them all.
an6.53:11.2: In the same way, diligence is one thing …
an6.53:12.1: The radiance of all the stars is not worth a sixteenth part of the moon’s radiance, so the moon’s radiance is said to be the best of them all.
an6.53:12.2: In the same way, diligence is one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
an6.53:12.3: the present life and lives to come.
an6.53:13.1: This is the one thing that, when developed and cultivated, secures benefits for both
an6.53:13.2: the present life and lives to come.”
an6.53:14.2: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
